abstract: United States Army will expand its nonlethal military assistance in Ukraine in fall, beginning with training of Ukrainian Army troops.
lead_paragraph: The modest expansion of nonlethal military assistance will begin with training this fall for Ukrainian Army personnel in the western part of the country.

headline.main: Ukraine: U.S. Expands Aid to Train Regular Army Troops
headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: U.S. Expands Aid to Train Regular Army Troops

snippet: The modest expansion of nonlethal military assistance will begin with training this fall for Ukrainian Army personnel in the western part of the country.
